name: Grabbot
description:
Islands powered by batteries float in the sky peacefully...

Until someone decided to shuffle every battery out of its slot

Now Grabbot needs to save the day

Using its robotic mind and arms to put everything back in place

  • 13 Headscratching Levels
  • 9 Optional Challenge Levels
  • Batteries Of All Sizes
  • 5 Song Soundtrack
  • Move: WASD, ARROWS 
  • Grab: SPACE
  • Restart: R
  • Undo: U, Z  
  • Toggle music: M
  • Toggle SFX: N

I hope you have fun!
